video.title: Romanzo criminale - La serie
video.synopsis: Based on the exploits of a real-life street gang, this 1970s thug saga delves into the dark, bloody milieu of Rome’s criminal underworld.

episodes.synopsis: After looting a truck full of typewriters, then graduating to arms dealing and kidnapping, a gang of thugs attracts the notice of a police inspector.
episodes.title: Episode 1.1

episodes.synopsis: Ice wants to reinvest the ransom money, but a bungled burial could expose the gang's plans. Lebanese storms out of a meeting with a criminal kingpin.
episodes.title: Episode 1.2

episodes.synopsis: The gang launches a bloody bid to take over Rome's drug trade but encounters stiff resistance from an intimidating underworld kingpin.
episodes.title: Episode 1.3

episodes.synopsis: Just as the Lebanese is about to retaliate against his old nemesis Terribile, groundbreaking news shakes the politically unstable country.
episodes.title: Episode 1.4

episodes.synopsis: Lebano leads a brutal campaign to wipe out rivals in Rome. Now allied with the Sicilian mafia, he and his cohorts get entangled in a terrorist plot.
episodes.title: Episode 1.5

episodes.synopsis: The Lebanese and his gang are in jail with a longtime enemy who wants revenge but underestimates the Lebanese.
episodes.title: Episode 1.6

episodes.synopsis: As the power struggle between the Lebanese and Terribile nears its climax, the Lebanese finds a way to rein in Patrizia.
episodes.title: Episode 1.7

episodes.synopsis: Disappointed that the Lebanese doesn't seem to trust him, Freddo becomes receptive to neo-fascist ideology.
episodes.title: Episode 1.8

episodes.synopsis: Lebano and Dandi plan to blackmail a cop, while Scialoja starts to lose a grip on the case as he falls in love with Patrizia.
episodes.title: Episode 1.9

episodes.synopsis: When Lebano, Dandi and Fierolocchio are tossed in jail, they're offered a chance a freedom if they agree to work for the authorities.
episodes.title: Episode 1.10

episodes.synopsis: Lebano becomes paranoid when he learns that members of the group are operating without his consent. The nephew of gang associate Puma is murdered.
episodes.title: Episode 1.11

episodes.synopsis: Ice decides to flee the criminal world with his girlfriend. Meanwhile, Lebano continues to descend into a drug-induced paranoid madness.
episodes.title: Episode 1.12

episodes.synopsis: Freddo and Dandi seek revenge for what happened to the Lebanese before the police can make an arrest.
episodes.title: Episode 2.1

episodes.synopsis: The gang battles a rival crew for control of the drug trade in Rome. Robert and Ice have relationship troubles.
episodes.title: Episode 2.2

episodes.synopsis: Bufalo and Dandi's disdain for each other leads to tensions that could tear the group apart. Scialoja takes aim at the gang's finances.
episodes.title: Episode 2.3

episodes.synopsis: The gang continues to battle with the Sardinians. Scialoja returns to the brothel to meet with Patrizia.
episodes.title: Episode 2.4

episodes.synopsis: The gang receives an offer from Don Mimmo that would come with a heavy cost. Scialoja continues closing in on Libanese's killer.
episodes.title: Episode 2.5

episodes.synopsis: Bufalo pleads insanity when he's charged with murder. Dandi finds that Patrizia has a new career.
episodes.title: Episode 2.6

episodes.synopsis: Freddo learns that the weapon that killed Libano belonged to his own gang. Meanwhile, a drug overdose sends his brother to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 2.7

episodes.synopsis: Bufalo assaults a priest in prison with the hope that he'll be deemed insane. Freddo approaches him and Ricotta with a plan to rid of the traitors.
episodes.title: Episode 2.8

episodes.synopsis: A snitch gives up information that leads to the arrest of five guys. Scialoia’s trial hinges on the testimony of a heroin addict.
episodes.title: Episode 2.9

episodes.synopsis: Buffoni and Scrocchiazeppia adjust to life outside of prison, and look to settle old scores with Freddo and Dandi.
episodes.title: Episode 2.10
